COVID-19 mitigation stratetgies: Controlling Risk by lightr traffic policies Abstract

COVID-19 mitigation stratetgies: Controlling Risk by lightr traffic policies Abstract Argument: The number of individual in a gathering could play an important role for control the spread of COVID-19. By controlling the size of meetings, we can mitigate the propagation new infections. However, this sort of restrictions has to be aligned with a delicate balance between the social and political implications. Then epidemiologists and government consuls has to deduce a policy accordingly. That is, balance between the cost and profit of limit the size of meetings. TODO list.
